name: Ballarde

Founded by a team of fragrance enthusiasts, Ballarde believes in creating scents that evoke emotions and memories, using high-quality ingredients sourced from around the world. name: Balleraud
description: Balleraud is a French perfume house that specializes in creating high-quality fragrances with an emphasis on artisanal craftsmanship. Established in Grasse, the heart of the French perfume industry, Balleraud showcases a rich heritage of blending traditional techniques with modern creativity. Their fragrances are known for their unique compositions that often highlight fine raw materials and bespoke creation processes, appealing to a discerning clientele seeking luxurious scent experiences.

name: Ballistic Therapy
description: Ballistic Therapy is a perfume company that specializes in creating bespoke fragrances designed to evoke emotional and sensory experiences. The company was founded with a mission to elevate personal scent choices through artisanal, handcrafted perfumes that blend unique ingredients and innovative formulations. Their story is rooted in the belief that scent has the power to transform everyday moments into extraordinary memories. They emphasize sustainable sourcing and quality, with a commitment to being environmentally friendly in their production processes.

name: Bally of Switzerland
description: Bally of Switzerland is a luxury fashion and lifestyle brand known for its high-quality leather goods, footwear, and accessories. Founded in 1851, Bally began as a shoemaker and has since evolved to include a range of products, including perfumes. The company has a rich heritage rooted in craftsmanship and Swiss quality. Bally is particularly renowned for its elegant designs and modern interpretations of classic styles, combining functionality with luxury. The perfume line reflects this ethos, featuring sophisticated scents that embody the spirit of the brand.

name: Balma Venitia

Established by a group of fragrance enthusiasts, the company aims to bring the essence of elegance and sophistication to the world of scents. Their perfumes are crafted from high-quality, sustainable ingredients, focusing on both artistry and environmental responsibility. Balma Venitia specializes in creating limited-edition fragrances that appeal to connoisseurs and individuals seeking exclusive olfactory experiences.

name: BALR.
description: BALR. is a lifestyle brand that operates at the intersection of sports, fashion, and luxury. Founded by a group of entrepreneurs including Dutch football player Ayman El Zein and entrepreneur Niels van der Sanden, the brand initially garnered attention through its premium sportswear. BALR. has expanded its product offerings to include various lifestyle products, including an exclusive line of fragrances that reflect the brand's high-quality and modern aesthetic, targeting the affluent market segment with a focus on style, confidence, and sophistication.

name: Banana Republic
description: Banana Republic is a premium clothing and accessories retailer known for its contemporary styles and classic, sophisticated approach to fashion. Founded in 1978, the brand originally began as a safari-themed store, and over the years it has evolved into a global retailer offering a wide range of apparel, including a signature line of fragrances. The company's fragrance line reflects its emphasis on quality and style, often associated with fresh and modern scents that appeal to a fashionable consumer base.

name: Baobab Collection
description: Baobab Collection is a Belgian luxury candle brand founded in 2002, known for its unique, handcrafted candles and home fragrances. The company draws inspiration from African culture and nature, and each candle is filled with high-quality wax and natural fragrances. Their products are often characterized by striking designs and the use of glass containers, making them eye-catching decorative pieces as well as functional items. Baobab Collection specializes in creating a sensory experience through fragrances that evoke various emotions and memories.

Their perfumes often carry the same cultural relevance and urban appeal as their apparel, aiming to attract a younger demographic who values style, exclusivity, and collectible items.

name: Baralan

name: Barbie

As the brand evolved, Barbie has become a cultural icon, branching into various merchandise lines, including fragrances that capture the essence of fun, fashion, and femininity. Established in 2013, the company initially focused on delivering high-quality beauty products to the market while emphasizing inclusivity and contemporary customer experience. Beauty Bay has grown to be known for offering a wide range of beauty brands, including indie and established labels, and it has gained a loyal customer base through its commitment to providing innovative products and trendsetting assortments.

name: Beauty Brand Development
description: Beauty Brand Development is a company focused on conceptualizing and developing innovative fragrance brands. With a strong emphasis on creativity and market trends, they specialize in crafting unique scent profiles for various market segments, including prestige and mass-market offerings. The company aims to empower brands through collaboration and an in-depth understanding of consumer preferences, helping them to stand out in a competitive landscape. Founded by experts in the fragrance and beauty industries, Beauty Brand Development has created a portfolio of successful products that resonate with audiences globally.

name: Beauty Brands International
description: Beauty Brands International is a prominent player in the fragrance industry, known for its wide range of beauty products, including perfumes. Established with a vision to cater to the dynamic beauty market, the company emphasizes creating innovative and high-quality products tailored to modern consumers. They focus on developing unique fragrances that appeal to various demographics and preferences, ensuring a blend of sophistication and accessibility. Beauty Brands International aims to stay ahead of trends, continually evolving their offerings to meet the needs of their clientele.
address: 12901 West 87th Street Parkway, Lenexa, KS 66215, United States

name: Beauty Bridge
description: Beauty Bridge is a retailer specializing in beauty and personal care products, including a wide range of fragrances. The company offers products from various established brands, focusing on quality and luxury within the beauty space. Founded with the mission to provide a curated selection of beauty products, Beauty Bridge aims to cater to the diverse needs of consumers seeking premium and niche options in the fragrance market.

name: Beauty Buffet
description: Beauty Buffet is a prominent Thai cosmetic and personal care brand that specializes in a wide range of beauty products, including perfumes, skincare, and body care items. Established with a vision to provide high-quality beauty solutions at affordable prices, Beauty Buffet is known for its innovative approach and ability to adapt to the ever-evolving beauty market. The brand emphasizes natural ingredients and aims to enhance the beauty experience through its unique product lines that often reflect popular themes, such as dessert-inspired fragrances. Their story began with a focus on delivering delightful experiences to customers, both through product formulation and aesthetic packaging.

name: Beauty Cafe
description: Beauty Cafe is a perfume and beauty company that specializes in creating engaging and delightful scents inspired by food and dessert. name: Beauty Clear
description: Beauty Clear is a perfume company known for creating affordable and high-quality fragrances that appeal to a wide audience. With a commitment to quality and innovation, Beauty Clear has positioned itself as a go-to brand for those seeking reliable and enjoyable fragrance options. name: Beauty Collection
description: Beauty Collection is a retailer that specializes in beauty and fragrance products, offering a wide array of perfumes and cosmetics from various brands. The company has established itself as a go-to destination for beauty enthusiasts, providing curated selections that cater to different preferences and tastes. Founded with the vision of making quality beauty products accessible, Beauty Collection aims to enhance its customers' shopping experience through personalized service and a diverse product range.

name: Beauty.com
description: Beauty.com was an online retailer specializing in beauty and personal care products, including perfumes, skincare, makeup, and hair care. The company was known for offering a diverse range of luxury and niche beauty brands, providing customers with a convenient shopping experience for high-end beauty products. Founded with the mission of making premium beauty accessible, Beauty.com focused on curating a selection of innovative and desirable products tailored to beauty enthusiasts. However, it should be noted that the website has ceased operations and now redirects to a parent company site.

name: Beauty Contact
description: Beauty Contact is a fragrance company known for its innovative approach to creating perfumes that enhance personal beauty and self-expression. The company integrates traditional perfumery techniques with modern sensibilities, focusing on quality ingredients sourced from around the world. Beauty Contact aims to appeal to a broad audience while also catering to niche markets, offering a diverse range of scents that cater to various preferences and occasions. Their philosophy revolves around empowering individuals through unique and evocative fragrances that tell a story.

name: Beauty Encounter
description: Beauty Encounter is an online retailer specializing in discounted perfumes and beauty products. Founded with the mission to provide customers access to a wide range of authentic fragrances at competitive prices, the company has a large selection of both well-known and niche brands. They cater to various demographics and aim to enhance the shopping experience by offering private-label products alongside their range of third-party goods. Their commitment to customer satisfaction and product authenticity has established Beauty Encounter as a trusted name within the online beauty shopping space.

name: Beauty Expert
description: Beauty Expert is a prominent online retailer specializing in beauty and cosmetic products, including a wide range of perfumes. The company curates an extensive selection of high-quality fragrances from both established and emerging brands, catering to diverse consumer preferences. Founded with the mission to provide an unparalleled shopping experience, Beauty Expert emphasizes customer service, competitive pricing, and product authenticity, making it a favored destination for beauty enthusiasts.

name: Beauty Habit
description: Beauty Habit is a retailer that focuses on offering a curated selection of niche, luxury fragrances and beauty products. Founded with the vision of providing unique and high-quality items, the company emphasizes a diverse range of scents from both established and emerging fragrance houses. Their specialty lies in promoting artisanal and innovative perfume brands that are often not widely available in traditional retail settings, catering to perfumistas and beauty enthusiasts looking for exclusive options.

name: Beauty Innovations
description: Beauty Innovations is a creative entity in the fragrance industry that specializes in developing innovative and unique perfume products. The company focuses on harnessing the power of scents to enhance personal expression and elevate daily experiences. Known for their trend-responsive approach to fragrance design, Beauty Innovations caters to a diverse audience with an emphasis on quality and uniqueness. Their story begins with a passion for olfactory artistry and a commitment to delivering exceptional fragrances that reflect individuality.

name: Beauty International
description: Beauty International is a perfume company known for its extensive portfolio of scents that span various fragrance families. Established in the late 1980s, the company initially focused on the distribution of luxury fragrances and has since evolved to develop its own line of perfumes. With a commitment to quality and innovation, Beauty International specializes in creating captivating and unique fragrance experiences that cater to diverse consumer preferences across the globe.

name: Beauty Must Haves
description: Beauty Must Haves is a perfume company that specializes in offering a range of high-quality fragrances designed to complement beauty and personal care products. They focus on creating unique scent profiles that cater to various customer preferences and seasonal trends. The brand is known for its contemporary approach to fragrance, blending traditional perfumery techniques with modern aesthetics and marketing strategies. With an emphasis on accessibility and variety, Beauty Must Haves aims to enhance the beauty rituals of its consumers through sensory experiences.

name: Beauty Pie
description: Beauty Pie is a membership-based beauty company that offers a range of high-quality cosmetics, skincare, and fragrances at significantly lower prices by cutting out the traditional retail markup. Founded in 2016 by Marcia Kilgore, the brand provides luxury products made in the same facilities as high-end brands, allowing members to access premium products without the high cost. The company has gained popularity for its transparent pricing model and focus on delivering value to its customers, thereby redefining the beauty shopping experience.

name: Beauty Planet
description: Beauty Planet is a perfume company that focuses on creating innovative and high-quality fragrances aimed at enhancing personal beauty and expression. Founded on the belief that fragrance is an essential part of personal identity, the company produces a diverse range of scents that appeal to a wide audience. They emphasize sustainability and eco-friendly practices in their production processes, setting themselves apart in the competitive perfume market.

name: Beauty San Spa
description: Beauty San Spa is a wellness and beauty company that specializes in providing spa services as well as developing a line of high-quality perfumes and beauty products. Their mission is to enhance personal wellness through luxurious treatments and fragrances that evoke tranquility and rejuvenation. Established with a passion for holistic beauty, Beauty San Spa combines traditional spa practices with contemporary fragrance development, often using natural ingredients to create unique scents that resonate with their clients.

name: BeautyBank
description: BeautyBank is a fragrance company known for creating unique and innovative perfumes. It operates under the umbrella of The EstÃ©e Lauder Companies Inc. BeautyBank focuses on bringing fresh and contemporary scents to the market, utilizing creative approaches to fragrance development. The company has positioned itself to cater to emerging trends in the beauty and fragrance sectors, providing in-house development capabilities and leveraging consumer insights to create products that resonate with the modern market.

name: Beautycounter
description: Beautycounter is a skincare and cosmetics company that focuses on creating safe and high-quality beauty products. Founded with the mission to improve the health and safety of personal care products, Beautycounter advocates for stricter regulations in the beauty industry, emphasizing transparency and high standards for ingredient selection. They offer a wide range of customizable and sustainable products, including skincare, makeup, and fragrance, prioritizing non-toxic ingredients while maintaining effective performance. Their commitment to education and advocacy has positioned them as leaders in the clean beauty movement.

name: BeautySpin
description: BeautySpin is a contemporary fragrance company that specializes in offering an extensive range of beauty and personal care products, including a diverse selection of perfumes. The company has built its reputation on curating high-quality fragrances that cater to various preferences and styles. They emphasize creativity and innovation in their scent compositions, often collaborating with industry artisans to produce unique olfactory experiences. BeautySpin aims to empower individuals through fragrance, allowing customers to express their personal style and enhance their daily rituals with signature scents.

name: Bebe
description: Bebe is a global fashion retailer and lifestyle brand known for its stylish and contemporary women's clothing, accessories, and fragrances. The company was founded in 1976 by Manny Mashouf in San Francisco, California, initially starting as a boutique that catered to young, fashion-forward women. Bebe entered the fragrance market as a natural extension of its brand, focusing on youthful, glamorous, and bold scents that resonate with their target demographic. The perfumes capture the essence of the Bebe lifestyle, emphasizing femininity and elegance.

name: Becca
description: Becca was a cosmetics brand that offered a range of beauty products including face and body cosmetics. Although primarily known for its makeup lines, the brand did venture into the fragrance industry by releasing various scent products that complemented their beauty collections. Becca was founded in Australia in 2001 and gained a reputation for its high-quality products tailored for diverse skin tones. In 2020, the brand ceased operations but left a legacy of dedicated followers.

name: Becker.eshaya
description: Becker.eshaya is a niche perfume brand known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. The company focuses on crafting unique, high-quality scents that embody the essence of individuality and artistry. Established with a dedication to merging artistic expression with olfactory experiences, Becker.eshaya has garnered attention for its distinctive blends and the stories behind each fragrance. The brand prioritizes using premium ingredients and sustainable practices, appealing to a discerning clientele that values both creativity and craftsmanship.

name: Beckham
description: Beckham Fragrances is a perfume line associated with the famous British footballer David Beckham. Established as a part of Beckham's lifestyle brand, the company focuses on creating a range of fragrances that aim to capture the essence of his personality and style. This includes both menâ€™s and womenâ€™s scents that often emphasize freshness and modernity, appealing to a broad audience. The brand reflects Beckham's image, blending sport, charisma, and appeal into its fragrance offerings that are marketed as stylish and accessible.

name: Bedeaux
description: Bedeaux is a luxury perfume house known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation, drawing inspiration from nature and human emotions. The company was founded with the philosophy of blending traditional perfumery techniques with innovative scent formulations, resulting in unique olfactory experiences. Bedeaux specializes in creating high-quality, hand-crafted fragrances that cater to a discerning clientele, focusing on sustainability and ethical sourcing of ingredients.

description: Beecham Beaute is a perfume company recognized for its luxurious and meticulously crafted fragrances. With a focus on quality ingredients and artistry, Beecham Beaute aims to provide an olfactory experience that resonates with the emotional connection of its consumers. The brand's story is rooted in a passion for beauty and a desire to elevate the everyday experience through the art of fragrance.

name: Beecham Cosmetics
description: Beecham Cosmetics is a well-established UK-based company that specializes in the formulation and creation of high-quality fragrances and personal care products. Known for its rich history in cosmetic development, the company has a strong focus on innovation and quality, leveraging both traditional methods and modern advancements in the fragrance industry. Their specialty lies in creating unique scent profiles that cater to a wide range of consumer preferences, aiming to deliver luxury at accessible prices.

name: Beecham Group
description: Beecham Group was a parent company originally known for its health and wellness products rather than a traditional perfume manufacturer. It was involved in various consumer health brands and healthcare products. The company became known for the development of brands that were later sold under different product categories including fragrance, but it does not operate primarily in the perfume industry as a standalone fragrance company. Over the years, Beecham Group went through significant transitions, including mergers and acquisitions, leading to its eventual integration into larger pharmaceutical and consumer brands.
